name: Solana
description: Solana (SOL) is the native cryptocurrency and ecosystem of a high-performance blockchain network designed for speed, scalability, and low costs, supporting decentralized applications (dApps), DeFi, and NFTs. It achieves its performance through a hybrid Proof of History (PoH) and Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, allowing it to process thousands of transactions per second. The SOL coin is used for network governance, transaction processing fees, and staking to secure the network. n
